user_request: Play the new Justin Bieber video on YouTube
screen_desc: The screenshot shows a YouTube video page with an advertisement banner at the top offering a 25% discount. Below the ad, a Taylor Swift video titled "All Too Well: The Short Film" is playing, with controls for play/pause, time tracking, and subtitles. The video has 76 million views, and the like/dislike buttons, as well as the comment section, are visible. Additionally, the screen shows the channel name, "Taylor Swift," and a comment referencing one of the video’s characters.
history_actions: click on the YouTube app located at the lower middle of the screen.

Future Action Plan: 2. Search for the new Justin Bieber video.
3. Select the new Justin Bieber video from the search results.
4. Press the play button to start watching the video.
think_action.Next Single Step Action: Tap on the YouTube search bar at the top of the screen.
